title: Location
description: A location, optionally with accompanying geographic coordinate data. Each location should also be a valid GeoJSON geometry object.

access.title: Access Rights
access.description: Since locations sometimes contain personal information like addresses, it is important to consider the proper access management policy for them.

geoJSON.title: GeoJSON Geometry Object
geoJSON.description: A GeoJSON object describing this Location. Must adhere to the GeoJSON format: http://geojson.org/.

name.title: Name
name.description: A name for this location, e.g. `Susan's House` or `Valley High School`, or `Shenandoah River`.

notes.title: Notes
notes.description: A collection of notes about this Location.

references.title: Bibliographic References
references.description: A collection of bibliographic references about this Location.

url.title: URL
url.description: The URL where information about this location can be retrieved.
